divs: Sighting Details I was on my way to work. I stopped at a stop signand noticed a bright light rising from the woods beside the road. At first Ithought it was a helicopter because it went straight up. There was no sound (mywindow was down). Two state troopers had stopped and saw it also. It rosestraight up and stopped. It had formed a triangle with two other lights. Atfirst I thought the other two lights were stars because they had not yet moved.After they had formed the triangle they moved together as one with lights ateach corner. I was able to follow them (or it) for about 7-10 minutes, until Ilost it inthe street lights.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Medina
There were no other sightings in Medina on or around August 10th 1998
